title: Sorry, Lucy: The Myth Of The Misused Brain Is 100 Percent False
teaser: The new Scarlett Johannson movie, Lucy, is based on the idea that most people only use only 10 percent of their brains. As it turns out, that idea is completely untrue â€” but it's oddly persistent.
